author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Richards: Will you please send on publication seven copies of my play as follows: The last four with enclosed slips. Please send all registered and also send me at once five copies here with amount due (i.e. six copies—beyond those free as per agreement and the postal outlay) so that I may remit same. If you care to send half a dozen copies, sale or return, the two Zurich booksellers here mentioned will take them. The copies will certainly be bought by friends of mine in Zurich. 1) MM Georges Crès et Cie Les Editions Françaises Rämistrasse, Zurich 2) Buchhandlung Ebell Bahnhofstrasse, Zurich With thanks in haste Sincerely yours James Joyce
